heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy, blustery, cold. Scattered snow showers, especially this afternoon in the north and mountains.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Snow showers north and mountains tapering off. Breaks in the clouds for southern valleys.

heading: Wednesday
text: Snow showers north, south through mountains. Clouds southern valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Scattered snow showers in the mountains, mixing with rain in the valleys.
